SELECT ITEM_NO , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_CNT , IS_USE , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DATE , ITEM.CATE_NO , CATE_NAME FROM ITEM, ITEM_CATEGORY CATE WHERE ITEM.CATE_NO = CATE.CATE_NO
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchItemVO.searchItemName}||'%'
AND ITEM.CATE_NO = #{searchItemVO.searchCateNo}
ORDER BY IS_USE DESC, REG_DATE OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ITEM_NO , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_CNT , ITEM.CATE_NO , CATE_NAME FROM ITEM, ITEM_CATEGORY CATE WHERE ITEM.CATE_NO = CATE.CATE_NO AND IS_USE = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DATE OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY
